Docs.summary: Gets or sets the binding that associates the column with a property in the data source.
Docs.value: The object that represents the data binding for the column. The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding%2A> property allows a column to specify a property of the data grid's <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> to bind to. For more information about binding paths, see the "Binding Path Syntax" section in [Binding Declarations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/binding-declarations-overview.md).
